translations: v.朝向，面对，使适合；定向放置（某物）；确定方位，认识方向（orient oneself）；引导；使熟悉，帮助适应
n.<旧>东方，东亚诸国（the Orient）；（优质珍珠的）光泽；优质珍珠
adj.<文>东方的，东方国家的；（尤指宝石）光彩夺目的；（太阳等）冉冉上升的，（白昼的光亮等）渐渐变强的

sentences.sentence: It took him some time to orient himself in his new school.
sentences.translation: 他经过了一段时间才熟悉新学校的环境。

sentences.sentence: The mountaineers found it hard to orient themselves in the fog.
sentences.translation: 登山者在大雾中很难辨认方向。

sentences.sentence: You will need the time to orient yourself to your new way of eating.
sentences.translation: 你需要时间适应新的吃法。
